Products.name: Green Goddess Chicken Salad
Products.description: This salad is a great way to use up leftover chicken. It is a light meal that is perfect for a hot summer day.

Products.description: Asian Cucumber Salad Recipe made with crunchy cucumber, onion, rice wine vinegar, and a few secret ingredients!

Products.name: Green Goddess fish Salad
Products.description: It is a non vegetarian salad which consists of the green goddess dressing mixed with fish, peppers, olives and celery.

Products.name: Avocado Toast
Products.description: A simple and delicious breakfast option with mashed avocado on toast, topped with a sprinkle of salt and pepper.

Products.name: Pancakes
Products.description: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup and fresh berries.

Products.description: A classic omelette with cheese, ham, and vegetables.

Products.name: Grilled Salmon
Products.description: Grilled salmon served with a side of vegetables and a lemon wedge.

Products.name: Steak
